name: Battles of Prince of Persia
description:
Follow the Prince on his harrowing journey in a Prince of Persia story
that has never been told before. Lead your army through the untold wars
and become a master of the battlefield.

Play as one of the nine generals and command the mighty armies of
ancient Persia, India, or Aresura.

Beat impossible odds on the battlefield by collecting and
strategically trading more than 200 cards.

Test new tactics and forces when you challenge friends to two fully
customizable multiplayer Versus mode.
